name: Dragon's Lair 3D: Return to the Lair
name_original: Dragon's Lair 3D: Return to the Lair
description:
Dragon's Lair 3D: Return to the Lair is an arcade game developed by DragonStone Software. It came out on 01-11-2002. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Dragon's Lair 3D: Return to the Lair is available on Xbox, GameCube, PlayStation 2 and PC.
